com.flowpowered.caustic.api.gl

Class RenderBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.Creatable
      • com.flowpowered.caustic.api.gl.RenderBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLVersioned
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GL20RenderBuffer, GL30RenderBuffer

    public abstract class RenderBuffer
extends Creatable
implements GLVersioned
    Represents an OpenGL render buffer. A render buffer can be used as a faster alternative to a texture in a frame buffer when its rendering output doesn't need to be read. The storage format, width and height dimensions need to be set with setStorage(com.flowpowered.caustic.api.gl.Texture.InternalFormat, int, int), before the render buffer can be used.

    • Nested Class Summary
